title: Episode 47: The Little Albert Study: What You Know is...Mostly Wrong
description: Think you know a lot about the little Albert experiment conducted by John Watson?  Well, guess what - you'd be surprised at how much of the story is simply not true.  If you're wondering whatever happened to little Albert, whether the little Albert study created a lasting phobia in a small boy, or even what place this story has in the history of behaviorism, then I suggest you take a listen to this episode of The Psych Files and get the facts on this fascinating part of psychology's history.
